text: فراغ الى ءالهتهم فقال الا تاكلون

translations.translation: He turned surreptitiously to their gods and said, 'Do you not eat?
Then he turned towards their gods and said: "Why do you not eat (of these offerings)?
Then he went quietly to the (temple of the deities) and said: “What is the matter with you, why do you not eat?
and he turned to their idols and asked them, "Do you eat?
He then sneaked upon their deities and said, “Do you not eat?”
Then he turned to their gods and said: "Will you not eat"
Then he turned aside to their gods secretly and said: What! do you not eat?
Then he turned to their gods, and said, 'What do you eat?
Then turned he to their gods and said: Will ye not eat?
He turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?
Then he slipped Unto their gods and said: eat ye not
Then he stole away to their gods and said, ‘Will you not eat?
Then did he turn to their gods and said, "will ye not eat (of the offerings before you)?...
Then he turned to their aliha (gods) and said: "Will you not eat (of the offering before you)?
Then he turned to their gods, and said: 'What do you eat?
Then he turned to their gods, and said, “will you not eat?
Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?
[37:91] Then he turned, he stole away, to their gods, the idols, in front of which the food had been placed, and said, mockingly: ‘Will you not eat? — but they failed to utter [a word].
(Then turned he) i.e. Abraham (to their gods and said) to them: (Will ye not eat) the honey you have on you?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثم لما بقي الأصنام خالياً عن الخدام، وقد طبخ عندها أنواع الطعام { فَرَاغَ } أي: مال وانصرف عليه السلام { إِلَىٰ آلِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ } أولاً على سيل التهكم والاستهزاء: { أَلا تَأْكُلُونَ } [الصافات: 91] أيها المعبودون من هذه الأطعمة المطبوخة المهيأة

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { فتولوا عنه مدبرين } أعرضوا عنه مولين الأدبار، { فراغَ إِلى آلهتهم } فمال إليها سرًّا، وكانت اثنين وسبعين صنماً من خشب، وحديد، ورصاص، ونحاس، وفضة، وذهب، وكان كبيرهم من ذهب، في عنقه ياقوتتان، { فقال } لها، استهزاء: { ألا تأكلون } من الطعام الذي وُضع عندكم، { ما لكم لا تنطقون }؟ والجمع بالواو والنون لأنه خاطبها خطاب مَن يعقل
